markup:
# Welcome to Markdown!
## Getting Started with Markdown

Use *italics* or **bold** to emphasize text.

- Create unordered lists with dashes
- Use numbers to create ordered lists

You can create [hyperlinks](https://www.example.com) in Markdown.

Embed images with ![Alt Text](https://www.example.com/image.jpg)

> Markdown is a lightweight markup language for creating formatted text.

```javascript
const greeting = "Hello, world!";
console.log(greeting);
```

---

| Header 1 | Header 2 |
| -------- | -------- |
| Row 1    | Data 1   |
| Row 2    | Data 2   |

To display code within text, use `inline code`.
